title: TDD: Storage module - graphcol, compaction, entity index
description:
Red-Green-Refactor TDD for storage module:
- GraphCol format encoding/decoding
- Data compaction
- Entity index operations
- Chunk management

title: feat: Add schema migration CLI tooling
description: CLI commands for schema versioning and migrations. Currently programmatic only.

title: P1: Add timeout check in recursive traversal loop
description: executor.ts:674-725 executeRecurse has MAX_PATH_DEPTH but no timeout. High fan-out graphs could cause long execution.

title: P2: Persist metrics to survive DO eviction
description: BrokerDO metrics are in-memory only. On DO eviction, metrics are lost.

title: docs: Add query language documentation
description: Query DSL exists but README examples are brief. Add comprehensive docs.

title: P1: Add pagination to vector cache loading
description: sqlite-index-store.ts:1446 loadVectorCache loads ALL vectors into memory. For 100K+ vectors this could cause OOM (128MB limit).

title: test: Add E2E tests against real Cloudflare
description: Current tests use vitest mocks. Add integration tests with real Cloudflare deployment.

title: feat: Implement CoordinatorDO for cross-shard coordination
description: Replace stub with real implementation. Required for distributed transactions and cross-shard queries.

title: P2: Add Known Limitations section to README
description: Document CoordinatorDO stub status and cross-shard query limitations.

title: TDD: Index module - FTS, HNSW, geo, combined
description:
Red-Green-Refactor TDD for index module:
- Full-text search indexing
- HNSW vector index
- Geo-spatial index
- Combined/hybrid search

title: P1: Add error logging in HNSW node connections
description: sqlite-index-store.ts:1356 getNodeConnections silently swallows SQL errors. Should log for debugging.

title: BLOCKER: Fix hash inconsistency between orchestrator and router
description: orchestrator.ts uses hashToShard() while router.ts uses fnv1aHash(). These could route differently causing data inconsistency.
close_reason: Fixed - in-memory store gated behind test mode, hash consolidated to fnv1aHash

title: P2: Add bundled size check to CI for snippet layer
description: Snippet layer must stay under 32KB. Add CI check to prevent regression.

title: P2: Use ObjectType.GEO_POINT instead of magic number 13
description: geo-index.ts:122 uses literal 13 instead of ObjectType.GEO_POINT.

title: BLOCKER: Remove in-memory store from GraphAPITarget
description: GraphAPITarget has #entities and #triples maps that bypass Shard layer entirely. Must remove or gate behind test flag for production.
close_reason: Fixed - in-memory store gated behind test mode, hash consolidated to fnv1aHash

title: TDD: Query module - parser, planner, executor
description:
Red-Green-Refactor TDD for query module:
- Query parsing and AST generation
- Query plan optimization
- Execution engine
- Result aggregation

title: feat: Add OpenTelemetry integration for observability
description: Export metrics and traces via OpenTelemetry for production monitoring.

title: TDD: Core module - types, validation, entity handling
description:
Red-Green-Refactor TDD for core module:
- Entity types and validation
- Schema validation
- Type guards and utilities
- Error handling patterns

title: P1: Optimize handleFilter to use POS index
description: shard-do.ts handleFilter fetches all triples then filters in-memory. Should use POS index.

title: TDD: Shard module - SQL ops, schema, batch
description:
Red-Green-Refactor TDD for shard module:
- SQL statement generation
- Schema migrations
- Batch insert/update operations
- Transaction handling

title: TDD: Security module - auth, permissions, sanitizers
description:
Red-Green-Refactor TDD for security module:
- Authentication flows
- Permission checking
- FTS query sanitization
- JSON input validation
- Injection prevention

title: feat: Add backup/restore from R2 CDC lakehouse
description: CDC streaming exists but replay/restore is not productionized.

title: P2: Fix dependency inversion - storage imports from shard
description: Storage layer imports CDCEvent from shard/triggers. Move CDCEvent to core/ or storage/.

title: TDD: Import module - batching, streaming, resumable
description:
Red-Green-Refactor TDD for import module:
- Batch import operations
- Streaming data ingestion
- Resumable imports
- Error recovery

title: P2: Standardize WebSocket messages on capnweb RPC
description: broker-do.ts uses ad-hoc message types alongside RPC. Migrate all to capnweb.

title: TDD: Broker module - orchestration, caching, validation
description:
Red-Green-Refactor TDD for broker module:
- Request orchestration
- Response caching
- Cross-shard coordination
- Response validation
